content.webTitle: Tell us: are you working from somewhere unexpected this year?

fields.headline: Tell us: are you working from somewhere unexpected this year?
fields.bodyText: The pandemic has meant that, for many of us, the spaces in which we spend the working day have changed considerably. Perhaps you used to go into the office, and now you not only have to work from home, but from your child’s bedroom? Or perhaps you’ve used the opportunity to work from somewhere completely different such as a boat, or even on the beach? Maybe you prefer your new, unexpected set-up and have found you get more done, or perhaps you can’t wait to return to your usual routine? Either way, if you’ve found yourself working from somewhere unexpected this year, we’d love to hear about it – and see a photo too, if possible. Share your experiences You can get in touch by filling in the form below. Your responses are secure as the form is encrypted and only the Guardian has access to your contributions. One of our journalists will be in contact for publication before we publish, so please do leave contact details. If you’re having trouble using the form, click here. Read terms of service here.
